ASP:
% Color in red any buyer of snack.
color(X,red):- triplet(X,didaction,A) ; triplet(A,isinstance,buy) ; triplet(A,target,T) ; triplet(T,isinstance,snack).

% Color in blue any snack eaten because i was hungry.
color(X,blue):- triplet(X,isinstance,snack) ; triplet(_,didaction,A) ; triplet(A,reason,hungry) ; triplet(A,target,X).
name: rdf_query_example
